scripts.systemd:install: sudo cp /var/scpnet/current/server/config/system/http.service /etc/systemd/system/scpnet-http.service && sudo cp /var/scpnet/current/server/config/system/worker.service /etc/systemd/system/scpnet-worker.service && sudo cp /var/scpnet/current/server/config/system/discord.service /etc/systemd/system/scpnet-discord.service
scripts.systemd:enable: sudo systemctl enable scpnet-http scpnet-worker scpnet-discord
scripts.systemd:restart: sudo systemctl restart scpnet-http scpnet-worker scpnet-discord
scripts.deploy:install: npm run crontab:install && npm run nginx:install && npm run nginx:reload && npm run systemd:install && npm run systemd:enable
scripts.deploy: ssh scpnet@${SCPNET_DEPLOY_SERVER:-scpfoundation.net} 'cd /var/scpnet && (yarn upgrade scpnet || (yarn install && yarn upgrade scpnet)) && npm run symlink && cd current && npm run db migrate:latest && npm run deploy:install && npm run systemd:restart'
